title: Day 1349
content:
# Day 1349

Man getting paid in bitcoin is a cheat code to life. Provide value to others and price your services in hard money. Thank me later anon!

![[https://x.com/NobodyCaribou/status/1995194725155184815?s=20](https://x.com/NobodyCaribou/status/1995194725155184815?s=20)](https://miro.medium.com/1*ntXATFT3WPRx6pZ82j1eTw.png)

In other news a friend of mine tweeted this out and it made my Day. Grateful to Bitcoiners spreading the good word and purchasing my coloring book. I must say Bitcoiners are some of the best people I know. They are generous, kind, and having babies like crazy.

Bullish on Bitcoiners building a better world for our kids.

11/30/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
